reviews.review_msg: Textbook is "Linear Algebra" by Fredberg, it's a brilliant book. The course content is difficult, the homework is tough but very inspirational. Each homework boosts your understanding of Linear Algebra. Prof is extremely helpful! If you love math or if you love linear algebra, this is the course to take! Do attend the lecture and take notes though
Amazing professor, one of the best I've ever had.

DeVos is an amazing professor, so kind and enthusiastic, has a compassionate approach for an upper level math course. Assignments were good practice and questions were taken from the textbook. Exams were based on assignments and lectures, and were very fair. I wish he could teach all of my math courses.

DeVos is simply awesome. Explains concepts intuitively, very approachable and enthusiastic, fair assignments and exams. It was great taking Advanced Linear Algebra with him this semester. It was his first time teaching this course and hopefully not his last.
